welcome_message_body: Welcome to Feltham, a charming town known for its beautiful parks, rich history, and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your time here and take the opportunity to explore all that this wonderful place has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: One of the oldest terminals at Heathrow, serving mainly domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A busy terminal with a mix of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The main hub for SkyTeam airlines, with a focus on long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly British Airways and their partners.

wifi.note: Free for 45 minutes, additional time can be purchased.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Farnborough Airport is exclusively for private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Centre
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for private jet passengers, offering VIP services and amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport serves a variety of airlines and offers a range of shops, restaurants, and services for travelers.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport serves a variety of airlines and offers a range of shops, restaurants, and services for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
